title: Amazon Announces Plans to Build New Headquarters in New York City
author: Jane Doe
text: Amazon has announced plans to build a new headquarters in New York City, which the company says will create thousands of new jobs and contribute billions of dollars to the local economy. The headquarters will be located in Long Island City, and will include more than 4 million square feet of office space. Amazon says it plans to invest $5 billion in the project over the next decade.
